the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers.`` We're excited about( Keon Clark ),'' Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Antonio Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. notes, Secretary of State Colin Powell said that Bush Administration officials are`` admirers'' of Ben Ali and Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld said the country provided'' href="http://blogs.aljazeera.net/americas/2011/01/20/what-happened-nice-tunisia-Donald Rumsfeld-told-us-about"> constructive leadership in the world'': It is worth rewinding and noting some choice words that former US secretary of state Colin Powell had to say about the country when he visited in December 2003. `` Our bilateral relationship is very, very strong,'' said Colin Powell .`` We are great admirers of Tunisia and the progress that has been achieved under Barack Obama Ben Ali 's leadership.''[...]

me. You're a pro. You're a hell of a lot better than others in this town.'' Howard Kurtz suspects that Donald Rumsfeld 's goal with this memoir is to leave readers with the same conclusion. But it contains few surprises and, after so many years of divisive debate, is unlikely to change many minds, writes Howard Kurtz .`` What is known is that he has in these 50 chapters marshaled his best defense; only history's final verdict remains unknown.''
